entry.title: Bloggering
entry.content:
I was granted the opportunity to migrate my journal to the Blogger Beta, and have been spending the afternoon labeling my posts.

I am not sure when I will get the time to make my blog look the way I want it to.

entry.title: Welcome, welcome
entry.content: This is a new journal for me, and one that is very public. I used to write long letters with some frequency but then just stopped about 5 years ago. I also used to keep a journal and seem to have stopped that about the same time. This journal is an attempt to get back into that groove and maybe to rant a little as well…
